briefdescription.para: Initialization of the GATT attribute pool variable.

detaileddescription.para: This macro creates the initializer for the new attribute pool.

briefdescription.para: Define a new GATT attribute pool.

detaileddescription.para: This macro creates a new attribute pool.

memberdef.name: BT_GATT_POOL_SVC
memberdef.initializer: do { \ int _ret; \ const struct bt_uuid *_svc_uuid = _svc_uuid_init; \ _ret = bt_gatt_pool_svc_alloc(_gp, _svc_uuid); \ __ASSERT_NO_MSG(!_ret); \ (void)_ret; \ } while (0)

parameterdescription.para: GATT service object with dynamic attribute allocation.

memberdef.name: BT_GATT_POOL_CHRC
memberdef.initializer: do { \ int _ret; \ const struct bt_gatt_attr _attr = BT_GATT_ATTRIBUTE( \ _uuid, _perm, _read, _write, _value); \ _ret = bt_gatt_pool_chrc_alloc(_gp, _props, &_attr); \ __ASSERT_NO_MSG(!_ret); \ (void)_ret; \ } while (0)

parameterdescription.para: GATT service object with dynamic attribute allocation.

memberdef.name: BT_GATT_POOL_DESC
memberdef.initializer: do { \ int _ret; \ const struct bt_gatt_attr _descriptor = BT_GATT_DESCRIPTOR( \ _uuid, _perm, _read, _write, _value); \ _ret = bt_gatt_pool_desc_alloc(_gp, &_descriptor); \ __ASSERT_NO_MSG(!_ret); \ (void)_ret; \ } while (0)

parameterdescription.para: GATT service object with dynamic attribute allocation.

memberdef.name: BT_GATT_POOL_CCC
memberdef.initializer: do { \ int _ret; \ _ccc = (struct _bt_gatt_ccc)BT_GATT_CCC_INITIALIZER(\ _ccc_changed, NULL, NULL); \ _ret = bt_gatt_pool_ccc_alloc(_gp, &_ccc, _perm); \ __ASSERT_NO_MSG(!_ret); \ (void)_ret; \ } while (0)

parameterdescription.para: GATT service object with dynamic attribute allocation.

briefdescription.para: Take a primary service descriptor from the pool.

parameterdescription.para: GATT service object with dynamic attribute allocation.
Number of arguments in svc would exceed array_size.
No internal memory in the gatt_poll module.

memberdef.argsstring: (struct bt_gatt_pool *gp, uint8_t props, struct bt_gatt_attr const *attr)
memberdef.name: bt_gatt_pool_chrc_alloc

briefdescription.para: Take a characteristic descriptor from the pool.

parameterdescription.para: GATT service object with dynamic attribute allocation.

briefdescription.para: Take an attribute descriptor from the pool.

parameterdescription.para: GATT service object with dynamic attribute allocation.

briefdescription.para: Take a CCC descriptor from the pool.

parameterdescription.para: GATT service object with dynamic attribute allocation.
Permissions to access CCC. Use the GATT attribute permission bit field values.

briefdescription.para: Free the whole dynamically created GATT service.

parameterdescription.para: GATT service object with dynamic attribute allocation.
